turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Konna ni Chikaku de....
turn.1: what does a 12 handicap in golf mean
turn.3: what year did the song come out
turn.4: "Konna ni Chikaku de..." is Crystal Kay's 20th single, released on February 28, 2007.
turn.5: what album was the song from
turn.6: It was Kay's second single from the album "All Yours" after "Kitto Eien ni".
turn.7: was the song used in a TV show
turn.8: This single was used for the ending credits of Japanese anime Nodame Cantabile.
turn.9: was the song used in another show
turn.10: In the anime, the melody from the song is used in accompaniment on the piano throughout the anime as background music.
turn.11: when was the song removed from the anime
turn.12: The song was then replaced after the twelfth episode of the anime by the song "Sagittarius" by Suemitsu and the Nodame Orchestra.
